archetype.description: System primarily follows schema_driven architectural pattern

architectural_archetype.description: System primarily follows schema_driven architectural pattern

insights.title: No Critical Invariants Detected
insights.description: The system does not appear to have explicitly defined critical invariants. This could indicate either a lack of formal invariant definition or that invariants are implicit.
insights.impact: Consider defining critical invariants for system resilience

recommendations.title: Define Critical System Invariants
recommendations.description: Establish explicit critical invariants that must always hold to prevent system-wide failures.
recommendations.action: Create invariant definitions for core system behaviors that cannot be violated.

recommendations.title: Document Invariant Behavior
recommendations.description: Ensure that all detected invariants are properly documented for team awareness.
recommendations.action: Create documentation explaining each invariant and why it exists.

recommendations.title: Monitor Invariant Violations
recommendations.description: Set up monitoring to track when invariants are violated during system operation.
recommendations.action: Implement logging and alerting for invariant violations.

architecturalHealth.assessment: The system lacks formal architectural invariants, making it vulnerable to structural degradation over time.

archetype.description: System primarily follows schema_driven architectural pattern

assumptions: Dynamic imports resolved statically where possible
Only code reachable from entry points analyzed
Third-party dependencies treated as black boxes
Build-time code generation not reflected in static analysis
ArcVision prioritizes execution-relevant structure over exhaustive file indexing. Non-runtime files are represented as envelope metadata unless they directly affect execution.

runtime_code.description: Source files that directly participate in runtime execution and system behavior

execution_scripts.description: Scripts invoked by runtime code to perform atomic or system-critical operations

infrastructure_scripts.description: Scripts that manage infrastructure-level behavior (queues, databases, orchestration)

configuration.description: Project configuration files represented as metadata, not execution graph nodes

documentation.description: Documentation files represented as metadata only

assets.description: Static assets with no effect on execution semantics
